remarks: Compose a homotopy with a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
htpyco2.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
htpyco2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
htpyco2.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. ( K Cn L ) ) $.
htpyco2.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( J Htpy K ) G ) ) $.
htpyco2 $p |- ( ph -> ( P o. H ) e. ( ( P o. F ) ( J Htpy L ) ( P o. G ) ) ) $.
